text: Alternative ribosome-rescue factor B (ArfB, YaeJ) also known as peptidyl-tRNA hydrolase,http://biocyc.org/ECOLI/NEW- IMAGE?type=ENZYME&object;=EG12354-MONOMER is a protein that plays a role in rescuing of stalled ribosomes. ==See also== * ArfA - Alternative ribosome- rescue factor A * arfB the gene for ArfB. ==References== ==External links== Category:Proteins
title: Alternative ribosome-rescue factor B
